findings.title: AMI EBS Snapshots Not Encrypted
findings.description: AMI 'web-app-v1.0' has unencrypted EBS snapshots. Data at rest is not encrypted.
findings.recommendation: Copy AMI with encryption enabled using 'aws ec2 copy-image --encrypted'
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: AMI Older Than 90 Days
findings.description: AMI 'api-backend-v2.0' is 145 days old. Outdated AMIs may lack security patches.
findings.recommendation: Create new AMI from updated instance and deregister old AMI
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: EBS Encryption By Default Not Enabled
findings.description: EBS encryption by default is not enabled for this region.
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: EBS Snapshot Not Encrypted
findings.recommendation: Create new encrypted snapshot and delete unencrypted snapshot
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: Unused EBS Volume Detected
findings.description: EBS volume is not attached to any instance.
findings.recommendation: Review volume and delete if no longer needed
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: EC2 Instance Using Default Security Group
findings.description: EC2 instance is using the default security group.
findings.recommendation: Create custom security group with least privilege
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: IMDSv2 Not Enforced on EC2 Instance
findings.description: EC2 instance does not enforce IMDSv2.
findings.recommendation: Enforce IMDSv2 to protect against SSRF attacks
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: Potential Secrets in EC2 User Data
findings.description: EC2 User Data may contain sensitive information.
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: ECS Task with Host Network Has Privileged Access
findings.description: ECS task using host network mode allows privileged access.
findings.recommendation: Remove privileged access or run as non-root user
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: ECS Container Running in Privileged Mode
findings.description: ECS container is running in privileged mode.
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: ECS Container Has Secrets in Environment Variables
findings.description: ECS container has potential secret in environment variable 'API_KEY'.
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: Lambda Function Has Overly Permissive IAM Role
findings.description: Lambda function has AdministratorAccess policy attached.
findings.recommendation: Replace with custom policy granting only required permissions
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: Lambda Function Publicly Accessible
findings.description: Lambda function has public access policy.
findings.recommendation: Remove public access and grant permissions to specific principals
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

findings.title: Lambda Function Using Deprecated Runtime
findings.recommendation: Update to a currently supported runtime version
findings.compliance_standard: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0

compliance_standards: CIS AWS Compute Services Benchmark v1.1.0
